channel.title: Paounds
channel.description:
Well, I got my iPhone somewhere around last year from a guy. He bought the iPhone in UK, and sold it to me for $120 without a Sim card and or the AT&T Service Plan. Then I got this:
[img]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/9860/img0002n.png[/img]
I believe this is fake, more or less since the prize email is kinda weird. Other than that, how the nigger did they get my number, I never gave it out to anyone other than my friends, and it has a weird phone number. Anyone else got this?
wat2do

item.title: Paounds
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

Is it an 07(7) mobile number? Good old British numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Paounds
item.dc:creator: @_saporta _saporta
item.description:
@_saporta wrote:

Question:
About 5 times a day, 2-3 times a night, I get random calls by faggots at the night, and after a few seconds, they hangup.
The numbers are all different, why is this happening. Is my phone going through puberty?

Read full topic

item.title: Paounds
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I get called quite often by niggers, or they send me a text in English telling me to be careful with their son, and giving his medicine at the right moment. They want you to respond, so they’ll know the random number they sent it to exists.

Read full topic

item.title: Paounds
item.dc:creator: @_saporta _saporta
item.description:
@_saporta wrote:

Evan`:

415,000 pounds, sounds like io9

He conjectures that his level of humour is quite eminent.

Elijah:

You’re an idiot, way to make a joke that wasn’t funny, and had nothing to do with the discussion. Go fuck yourself.

He conjectures that his level of intimidation is sufficient to terrorize other tots.

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:4, topic:301054”]They don’t need to “contact” anyone to get your number.
Phone numbers are pretty basic. So right now I’m going to text 572-499-5920 and tell them I have $300 of weed I have to get rid of quick and I’ll tell them to meet me in Central Park.
No espionage or contacting their phone service at all.[/quote]
He conjectures that his level of intelligience is enough to keep others at bay.

SomethingToHide:

Quit saying nigger it doesn’t make you look cool.

fuck

Read full topic

item.title: Paounds
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Quit saying nigger it doesn’t make you look cool.

They don’t need to “contact” anyone to get your number.

Phone numbers are pretty basic. So right now I’m going to text 572-499-5920 and tell them I have $300 of weed I have to get rid of quick and I’ll tell them to meet me in Central Park.

No espionage or contacting their phone service at all.
